main.name: Rowan Smith
main.description: I am driven by a voracious thirst for knowledge and a passion for technology.
main.bio: I'm a developer working in Javascript, with knowledge various front and back end technologies. I collect Movies, Records, Video Games, and Books. I have a beautiful wife and two feline sons, Tuna and Mackerel
main.contactmessage: If you would like to get in contact with me, feel free to drop me a message below!

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: 20 week intensive Javascript-based boot camp. Created a solo application, REWINDR, a database application for VHS tapes. Worked on a team to develop a scorekeeping application for HighTech Kids' Lego League Tournaments.
Associate Editor of Murphy Square Literary and Arts Journal. Winner of the Engman Award in Fiction. Contributing writer for The Augsburg Echo newspaper.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
